name: Real Drum Kit - Dance Version
description:
A multi-touch drum Dance kit application, simulation the realistic experience.

Record your own session , you can play on it, like a real drum set machine.
Play drums along with your songs! You can load your songs from the left bottom corner of drum screen.

The App is designed for everyone: children, percussionists, musicians, drummers,amateurs, beginners ... Simulates a real Drum and Cymbals on your mobile device or tablet screen. It is funny and easy to play, just drumming your fingers on the pads of the drums and cymbals, then the sound is played simultaneously.
Sounds are taken from a real drums and they give you studio quality. Low latency, multi-touch and cool animations in a combination with recording option give you the ultimate real drum experience.

Features:
* Multitouch, you can drumming multiple drums and cymbals simultaneously
* 10 drum pads
* High quality sound allow you to feel like a real drummer.
* The fastest response time, low latency (without any delay).
* HD drums images.
* Animations for each instrument.
* Play drums and cymbals along with the beat of your songs.
* The ability to not only play here and now, but also save, play, and loop the playback of your tracks.
* Replay the recording along with the animation of the drums and cymbals.
* Set the volume for each drum and cymbals individually.
* Set the volume of the background music individually.
* The application is optimized for screens of any size, including tablets.

If you are a Drum enthusiast, Download it , you will not be disappointed！
